name: Boba Simulator 2020
description:
Every list of game development advice we've ever read includes this one point: don't start out by making your dream game. Pick something mind-numbingly simple, then cut the scope in half, and if you're lucky, your time estimate won't be off by more than double.

We brainstormed for a while, and ultimately landed on an idea that we thought was very simple, very good for a learning exercise, and very cute. Announcing... Boba Simulator 2020!!!

The machines at the shop have a mind of their own. Can you make a good drink anyway?

This game was made entirely as an educational exercise for us. Check out our blog post about the development of this game!
